column4: Hello everyone. I need some advice. Which filesystem would give the best performance for ide disk based ftp server, crowded with ~600 mB .iso files? I'm thinking about ext2 or ext3... Any ideas? Thanks.
If it's over FTP it doesn't matter. The files are large so it doesn't matter.
If you use ext2 and the system goes down for whatever reason, it'll take a while to bring it back up.
